messages.subject: Re: Chapter 26 - The Courtship of Lady Tokio
messages.msgSnippet: Sec thanks Mio for introducing another well known Bakumatsu figure into her story...Yamakawa Okura (Taizo or Hiroshi) (^_^) Itou lovefest....hehehehe I know
messages.messageBody:
Sec thanks Mio for introducing another well known Bakumatsu figure
into her story...Yamakawa Okura (Taizo or Hiroshi) (^_^)

Itou lovefest....hehehehe

I know that the Courtship is a drama with moments of levity...but for
me...I love silly comedies

Ok I KNOW this is RK Saitou in Mio's story...but WHAT IF... (^_^)

::sec imagines::

Itou "Saitou, I have my suspicions about you...why don't you prove
your loyalty to me" (Itou pauses to look at Saitou from head to toe,
raking his eyes over the wolf's desirable body) "in my bedroom"

Saitou ::ooc moment:: (*_*)

since I'm posting to the list I wanted everyone to know that this site
http://www.shinsengumi-exp.jp/

is doing "podcasting" or something...I have no idea what that is

--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, Mio Yamada
<purplealienmio@...> wrote:

Itou lovefest.

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Chapter 26 - The Courtship of Lady Tokio
messages.msgSnippet: I thought this story was going to die out the way I let mine die, BUT  NO!   Oh, how happy I was seeing a lil reminder arrive in my  e-mail that the stroy
messages.messageBody:
I thought this story was going to die out the way I let mine die, BUT NO! Oh, how happy I was seeing a lil reminder arrive in my e-mail that the stroy still contiues!

And look, you also brought life back to the mailing list ^.^
And as always an extreamly lovely read and most refreshing.
-Bunneh

Mio Yamada <purplealienmio@...> wrote: I don't usually do this, but I've been receiving
threatening emails from readers regarding updates (in
fact, only a few hours after I updated, one reviewer
called in a bomb threat).

After almost half a year of dawdling, a new chapter
has been added, and a lot of footnotes in the process.
As always, I submit to the Shinsengumi experts for
criticisms and flames.

Chapter 26: http://www.fanfiction.net/s/2049030/27/

Mio Yamada <purplealienmio@...> wrote:
Phew! Well at least one person remembers this story!
And I hope you didn't hate it.

Seriously though, I can't wait to start writing the
next part - though I'll seriously have to rein myself
in to prevent it becoming an all out Itou lovefest.


--- shinsengumi3@... wrote:


---------------------------------
Well might I be the first to say, THANK GOD!!!!! It's
the only fic I'm
following at the moment, and I've been waiting with
bated breath.

Seriously though, I can't wait to start writing the
next part - though I'll seriously have to rein myself
in to prevent it becoming an all out Itou lovefest.

messages.subject: Chapter 26 - The Courtship of Lady Tokio
messages.msgSnippet: I don t usually do this, but I ve been receiving threatening emails from readers regarding updates (in fact, only a few hours after I updated, one reviewer
messages.messageBody:
I don't usually do this, but I've been receiving
threatening emails from readers regarding updates (in
fact, only a few hours after I updated, one reviewer
called in a bomb threat).

After almost half a year of dawdling, a new chapter
has been added, and a lot of footnotes in the process.
As always, I submit to the Shinsengumi experts for
criticisms and flames.

Chapter 26: http://www.fanfiction.net/s/2049030/27/
